ygData.subject: gordon answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Clipped: Bard Bugs/Not a Whine (v2000.05.22) - long Abashi/Brad/Gordon, I have compiled a list of all bard bugs to date for your review and comments. Sorry
ygData.messageBody:
Clipped:

Bard Bugs/Not a Whine (v2000.05.22) - long
Abashi/Brad/Gordon, I have compiled a list of all bard bugs to date for your review and comments. Sorry this is so long, but there are a lot of bugs.

(his answer)

I apologize but it is taking a bit longer than I'd hoped to look into these issues. As some will notice, at least one issue has been resolved with another being considered publicly.

I'll get back with you soon.

Just one note, has anyone tried the two psalms mentioned recently? Just a few weeks ago a bug was corrected that was causing secondary effects on bard songs to fail.

-Gordon



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
